name: WordPress插件Shortcodes and extra features for Phlox theme信息泄露漏洞
product: ["WordPress Shortcodes and extra features for Phlox theme plugin <=2.17.13"]
description: WordPress是一套使用PHP语言开发的博客平台。该平台具有在基于PHP和MySQL的服务器上架设个人博客网站的功能。WordPress plugin是一个应用插件。WordPress插件Shortcodes and extra features for Phlox theme存在信息泄露漏洞，该漏洞源于应用对于敏感信息保护不足，攻击者可利用该漏洞获取敏感信息。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://wordpress.org/plugins/auxin-elements
patch: WordPress插件Shortcodes and extra features for Phlox theme信息泄露漏洞的补丁
